&#3942;&#3999;&#3962;: [1103] ming mtha' ga nga ba ma 'a dang/ mtha' med kyi rjes su sbyor ba'i lhag bcas kyi phrad cig  ... ga nga ba ma 'a ... rin gong bcag ste 'tshong ba/ ... gang yang ma mthong ste/ mig gis ma bltas pas so/ ... zab ste/ gting thag ring ba'o/ ... sems kyi nang du ma bsams te ma dran pa/ ...
affix for the gerund, gerundive connective, this is when
1) gerundive connective particle, after--, having--, * &; 2) adverbial functioning; 3) defining function: where? how? namely, to wit, viz: or adding/ elaborating[IW]

1) the gerundive connective particle. having / after having. 2) adverbial function. -ing. 3) defining function: where. 4) namely, to wit, videlicet; te/ ste/ de - semicolon; colon or m-dash; rather; so, thus. colon, semicolon
